title: Having Siblings abroad who have neglected their duty towards the parents - Assim al hakeem
transcript: we have siblings that did not care about our parents did not contribute financially though they have and they have lived in Europe or in America for so many decades and it hurts us okay it shouldn't hurt you there will be held accountable on the day of judgment you will be held accountable for civil in your kinship even if you hate their guts if you don't approve of what they had done this does not justify you boycotting them or not calling them or not connecting to your kinship do your obligations and on the day of judgment they will pay for what they had missed
